edu.ucla.sspace.matrix

Class Matrices

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.matrix.Matrices

  • public class Matrices
extends Object
    A class of static methods for manipulating and creating Matrix instances.
    See Also:
    Matrix, MatrixIO

    • Method Detail

      • asMatrix

        public static <T extends DoubleVector> Matrix asMatrix(List<T> vectors)
        Returns a Matrix from a list of DoubleVectors. The resulting matrix will be modifiable. Any modifications will affect the vectors stored in the passed in list.

      • asSparseMatrix

        public static <T extends SparseDoubleVector> SparseMatrix asSparseMatrix(List<T> vectors)
        Returns a SparseMatrix from a list of SparseDoubleVectors. The resulting matrix will be modifiable. Any modifications will affect the vectors stored in the passed in list.

      • asSparseMatrix

        public static <T extends SparseDoubleVector> SparseMatrix asSparseMatrix(List<T> vectors,
                                                         int columns)
        Returns a SparseMatrix from a list of SparseDoubleVectors. The resulting matrix will be modifiable. Any modifications will affect the vectors stored in the passed in list.

      • create

        public static Matrix create(int rows,
            int cols,
            boolean isDense)
        Creates a matrix of the given dimensions and selects the matrix implementation by considering the size and density of the new matrix with respect to the available memory for the JVM.
        Parameters:
        rows - the number of rows in the matrix
        cols - the number of columns in the matrix
        isDense - whether the returned matrix will contain mostly non-zero elements

      • copy

        public static Matrix copy(Matrix matrix)
        Returns a copied version of a given matrix. The returned matrix will have the same dimensionality, values, and sparsity, but it may not have the same exact sub-type.
        Parameters:
        matrix - the matrix to be copied
        Returns:
        a copied version of matrix
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when the dimensionality of matrix and output do not match

      • copyTo

        public static Matrix copyTo(Matrix matrix,
            Matrix output)
        Copies values from matrix to output and returns output. output is assumed to be empty. This method is useful for uses who wish to specify the type of matrix used during a copy operation.
        Parameters:
        matrix - the matrix to be copied
        output - the matrix storing the copied values.
        Returns:
        output
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when the dimensionality of matrix and output do not match

      • create

        public static Matrix create(int rows,
            int cols,
            Matrix.Type matrixType)
        Creates a new Matrix based on the provided type, with the provided dimensions
        Parameters:
        matrixType - the type of matrix to create
        rows - the number of rows in the matrix
        cols - the number of columns in the matrix

      • getMatrixBuilderForSVD

        public static MatrixBuilder getMatrixBuilderForSVD()
        Returns a MatrixBuilder in the default format of the fastest available SVD algorithm.
        Returns:
        a matrix builder to be used in creating a matrix for use with the SVD class

      • getMatrixBuilderForSVD

        @Deprecated
public static MatrixBuilder getMatrixBuilderForSVD(boolean transpose)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a MatrixBuilder in the default format of the fastest available SVD algorithm that will optionally transpose the matrix data on input
        Parameters:
        transpose - true if the input columns to the MatrixBuilder should be transposed (i.e. become rows) in the final matrix
        Returns:
        a matrix builder to be used in creating a matrix for use with the SVD class

      • multiply

        public static Matrix multiply(Matrix m1,
              Matrix m2)

      • resize

        public static Matrix resize(Matrix matrix,
            int rows,
            int columns)
        Returns a new Matrix that has been resized from the original, truncating values if smaller, or adding zero elements if larger.

      • synchronizedMatrix

        public static AtomicMatrix synchronizedMatrix(Matrix m)
        Returns a synchronized (thread-safe) matrix backed by the provided Matrix.
        Parameters:
        m - the matrix to be made thread-safe
        Returns:
        a synchronized (thread-safe) view of the provided matrix.

      • synchronizedSparseMatrix

        public static AtomicMatrix synchronizedSparseMatrix(SparseMatrix m)
        Returns a synchronized (thread-safe) matrix backed by the provided SparseMatrix.
        Parameters:
        m - the matrix to be made thread-safe
        Returns:
        a synchronized (thread-safe) view of the provided sparse matrix. The returned matrix will also be a SparseMatrix

      • transpose

        public static Matrix transpose(Matrix matrix)
        Returns the transpose of the input matrix, i.e. where every element (i,j) in the output has the value of the element at (j,i) in the input.
